    SemialgebraicSets.multiplicationmatrices — Function.
    multiplicationmatrices(V::AbstractAlgebraicSet, algo::AbstractMultiplicationMatricesAlgorithm)::Union{Nothing, Vector{<:AbstractMatrix}}

    Computing multiplication matrices from the algebraic equations for which V is the set of solution using the algorithm algo. Returns a nullable which is null if V is not zero-dimensional and is the list of multiplication matrices otherwise.

    SemialgebraicSets.solvealgebraicequations — Function.
    solvealgebraicequations(V::AbstractAlgebraicSet, algo::AbstractAlgebraicSolver)::Union{Nothing, Vector{<:Vector}}}

    Solve the algebraic equations for which V is the set of solutions using the algorithm algo. Returns a nullable which is null if V is not zero-dimensional and is the list of solutions otherwise.

    SemialgebraicSets.solvemultiplicationmatrices — Function.
    solvemultiplicationmatrices(Ms::AbstractVector{<:AbstractMatrix{T}}, algo::AbstractMultiplicationMatricesSolver)::Vector{Vector{T}} where T

    Solve the algebraic equations having multiplication matrices Ms using the algorithm algo. Returns the list of solutions.

    SemialgebraicSets.spolynomial — Function.
    spolynomial(p::AbstractPolynomialLike, q::AbstractPolynomialLike)

    Computes the S-polynomial of p and q defined by

    \[S(p, q) = \frac{m}{\mathrm{\mathsc{LT}}(p)} \cdot p - \frac{m}{\mathrm{\mathsc{LT}}(q)} \cdot q\]

    where $m = \mathrm{lcm}(\mathrm{\mathsc{LM}}(p), \mathrm{\mathsc{LM}}(q))$.
